item.title: Devon Energy, Coterra Energy Reportedly Hold Merger Talks
item.description: According to a report from Bloomberg, an all-stock deal is one of the options being considered in the merger talks between the companies.

item.title: Talen Energy Stock Rallies More than 10% - What’s Driving The Optimism?
item.description: Talen Energy said it is acquiring PJM natural gas assets from Energy Capital Partners for about $3.45 billion.

item.title: TSMC Draws Analyst Price Target Updates After Blowout Q4 Results — Retail Says AI Bubble Narrative Shattered
item.description: Bank of America and Needham raised price targets on Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. after the company’s profit surged 35%.

item.title: BTOG Stock Tanks Over 30% — What Drove Shares To A Nearly Nine-Month Low?
